signature: RTree<T, S> delete(Entry<? extends T, ? extends S> entry, boolean all)

enhanced_by.reason: The depth of the tree might change after deletion, which could affect other operations.
The list of entries might be used to verify the state of the tree before and after deletion.

enhanced_by.method_name: add(Entry<? extends T, ? extends S> entry)
enhanced_by.reason: Adding an entry can be used to verify that the deletion operation works correctly by reverting the deletion.
Searching for the deleted entry can verify that it has been successfully removed from the tree.
